testcase.title: 001)On opening the CTI accordion a picture tile is shown in the tile 3 position

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly

steps.title: the "New Home" page should be loaded on log on
I expand "Clinical Trials Intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify image is displayed in tile three Accordion "Clinical Trials Intelligence"

substeps.message: title=Clinical trials,content=View all Clinical trials informationare present

steps.title: I verify Title "Clinical trials" and content "View all Clinical trials information" is present on pitcure tile under accordion "Clinical trials intelligence"
I collapse "Clinical Trials Intelligence" Accordion in Home Page

testcase.title: 003)Clicking on the picture tile opens the "Clinical Trials Intelligence" page

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly

steps.title: the "New Home" page should be loaded on log on
I expand "Clinical Trials Intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify image is displayed in tile three Accordion "Clinical Trials Intelligence"
I click on image displayed in 'tile three' accordion "Clinical Trials Intelligence"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Clinical Trials report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Clinical Trials" on page 'Results'
I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel on new Home page
I collapse "Clinical Trials Intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
